passives.name: Support Quest
passives.effects: Earn 400 through Shared Riches to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Runic Compass}}, gaining the Ward active with 3 wards in stock.

passives.name: Shared Riches
passives.effects:
Grants a Shared Riches charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within icononly=true 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 15 and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion below {{rd|50%|30%}} of its maximum health executes it.
• Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you 22. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Receives {{ii|Lane Swap Detector}} penalties if detected within the top or middle lanes early in the game.
